name: Mazing Trivia
description: Learn about random things as you try to make it to end of the maze!  You have 60 seconds to get to the end of the maze. If you are running out of time, run into one of the orange '?' blocks to get a question.  Answer the question CORRECTLY and get 5 seconds added to your time Answer the question INCORRECTLY and lose 5 seconds  Learn all the facts to get the best chance of winning. GOOD LUCK!
